= Introduction =

ZAPLink is a framework. This means that it allow (as far as possible) to let you enhance features by adding your own developments :
  * Connectors
  * Extend Framework concept by ABAP Object inheritance
  * BADI implementation
  * ...
This intend to upgrade ZAPLink Framework without breaking you own developments
  
= Details =

ZAP Link framework is developed with ABAP Objects. ABAP Programs are only used to provide user interface with objects.
